title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 32.10 - Personal injury report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 32.10 - Personal injury report

State Regulations

By the close of the first business day following
notification that any person may have sustained a serious personal injury
connected with the operation or use of a tramway or a part thereof, the owner
shall by telephone or otherwise report the same to the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
32.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
